FuncDef: The acl name command creates a basic ACL and displays the ACL view. If the basic ACL to be created already exists, running this command directly displays the ACL view. The acl name command creates a basic ACL and displays the ACL view. If the basic ACL to be created already exists, running this command directly displays the ACL view. By default, no basic ACL is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Creates a basic ACL with a name.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Creates a basic ACL with a keyword.
-

Creates a basic ACL with a number.
The value is an integer ranging from 2000 to 2999.

ExtraInfo: A basic ACL defines rules for filtering packets based on the source IP addresses of packets. To create a basic ACL, run the acl command.
